DOC.detailed_description: Nanoparticle albumin-bound paclitaxel ( nab-paclitaxel ) novel , solvent-free , albumin-bound nanoparticle form paclitaxel design avoid problem associated solvent use Taxol . And albumin-bound paclitaxel characterize high tolerate dos great efficacy , great concentration tumor tissue compare normal tissue . A multicenter randomize control trial ( coded CA031 ) show nab-paclitaxel combination carboplatin high response rate traditional paclitaxel plus carboplatin , especially squamous lung cancer . This single center , non-randomized , open-label Phase II clinical study investigate efficacy tolerability nab-paclitaxel monotherapy previously treat advanced metastatic squamous lung cancer failure platinum-based doublet therapy .
